about_the_game:
BULLEZINE IS A 2D ADVENTURE ROGUELITE

In Bullezine, you guide Luna, the queen of Bullezine, to save her people from "oblivion." Inspired by classic roguelites, Bullezine aims to be a simplified and accessible version of the genre for a wider audience.

FEATURES

Bullezine collection

As you embark on your adventures, you'll rescue Bullezine with different characteristics and rarities.

Attack customization

You can modify your creatures' attacks to give them devastating effects: poison, explosion, life leech... Choose what will be most effective for your team.

World map

Progress through the world by choosing your path.

Events

Various events with multiple choices will enhance your adventure.

Achievements

Unlock achievements to access new features and increase your power.

Randomization

Thanks to the randomization of the map and Bullezine, each playthrough is unique and guarantees entertainment every time.

name: Bullezine

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7800, AMD HD 4600, Intel HD Graphics 3000 or above
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Card
